parameters.name: thickness
parameters.description: Thickness of the circle outline, if positive. Negative thickness means that a filled circle is to be drawn

parameters.name: lineType
parameters.description: Type of the circle boundary. 8=connected line. 4=connected line. CV_AA=antialiased line.

parameters.name: shift
parameters.description: Number of fractional bits in the coordinates of the center and in the radius value
